name: Sex Play - Night Club
description:
A quick and dirty Visual Novel with juicy animations and sex simulator elements.
Step into the shoes of a nightclub manager and convince a sexy blonde to spread her legs for you, to get the coveted dancer job.
Will she be willing to do whatever it takes?

GAME DESCRIPTION

Being a nightclub manager is no easy job, but it surely has its perks. Especially when there’s a new dancer position available at the club, and you’ve been given the task of choosing a lucky lady out of a pool of sexy dancers.
The first girls to audition are all hot and talented and would do great on the main stage, but when the last one walks in with her blonde hair, long legs, and body to die for, you just know you hit the jackpot.
You decide to play dirty and make her work for the job, suggesting there might be another way to get it.

Will the blonde be willing to do what it takes to get the job?
Follow the story and find out!

FEATURES

- HD renders
- HD animations
